website_summaries.verdict: A quality light up sneaker. LEDs light when pressure is applied, rather than being constantly on.
pros: A comfortable shoe with great grip
The sock liner and cushioned midsole are removable
These sneakers feature a standout design – the big cats light up rather than the whole sole
A big hit with young wearers
cons: Sizes can run small, so you may want to size up

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great But Cut Smaller Than Normal
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers and so does my toddler! I fell in love with this style while shopping in the Puma store however they didn't have his size. He wears a size 8 but these are cut smaller than "normal" size 8 shoes for toddlers so I will be exchanging for the next size up. Other than that great design, vibrant colors, and we haven't had the opportunity to wear them yet to comment on the lighting up aspect of his sneaks.
customer_reviews.author: thanashia leith

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Lights Up
customer_reviews.text: Works good for my slim footed son. My boys wear the same size shoe. I won't put these on my thick plump footed toddler. Child loves that these light up. After having these for some time, the shoes tend to be on the cheap side on quality.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Little one loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes! My son loves them, he's loving the lights. They are pretty good quality and the curve in the front reduces the stumbles and makes walking easier. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pair for daycare
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year-old loves these shoes that light up! Perfect pair for daycare!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy!!!! The shoes light up and didn't even realize till a day later lol love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Bad day.
customer_reviews.text: Asked for a t9 but i get a t8. :(
customer_reviews.author: Juan L. Carrasco

customer_reviews.title: Beware the lights that no longer march
customer_reviews.text: Stopped lighting up fully in about two weeks. Just a single flash from each now.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lights don't flicker long and dont set off very easily. Good overall !
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Liden

customer_reviews.title: You should order a size larger
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoe. Should have ordered larger size. Run small
customer_reviews.author: Ana Soto

customer_reviews.title: Didn't receive size that was ordered
customer_reviews.text: Lovely sneakers. However, I ordered size 10 and received 9 which was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfy my 1 year old loves these!
